meanings.definition: A small office or branch of a larger organization.
meanings.sent1: The subbureaux in our town handle customer inquiries.
meanings.sent2: I visited the subbureaux of the company to submit my application.
meanings.sent3: The subbureaux were so tiny, they looked like dollhouses!
meanings.sent4: The subbureaux acted as the roots supporting the growth of the main office.
meanings.sent5: The subbureaux buzzed with activity, like a beehive of productivity.

meanings.sent1: There are multiple subbureaux across the country.
meanings.sent2: The subbureaux are all interconnected through a central system.
meanings.sent3: The subbureaux gathered for a group photo, looking like a tiny army.
meanings.sent4: The subbureaux stood together like a cluster of stars in the night sky.
meanings.sent5: The subbureaux multiplied like rabbits, expanding rapidly.
